entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is trying to see past the barman's long hair and beard.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: An elf who was sent by the barman to help Harry. He has been killed by Bellatrix Lestrange.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: A person who killed Dobby, an elf sent by the barman to help Harry.

entities.name: the barman
entities.description: The owner of the bar. He has a long hair and beard and wears spectacles.

relationships.description: Dobby was sent by the barman to help Harry. This is mentioned in the line 'You sent Dobby'.
Bellatrix Lestrange killed Dobby, an elf who was sent by the barman to help Harry. This is mentioned in the line 'He's dead, Bellatrix Lestrange killed him'.
The barman sent Dobby to help Harry. This is mentioned in the line 'You sent Dobby'.
